item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X 🌄
item.description: Who doesn’t love running circles around their enemies?! But can you guess who exactly is circling here? 😵‍💫

item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X 🎬
item.description:
It’s the rise of the machines as mecha champions come to wreak havoc on the Rift on May 16th!
🌑 Nocturne 🤖 Mecha Nocturne 🤖 Mecha Volibear 🤖 Mecha Maokai 🤖 Mecha Nautilus
